bluetooth_confirm.title: BM2 Battery Monitor discovered
bluetooth_confirm.description:
Do you want to add `{name}` to Home Assistant?

It is recommended to select the appropriate battery chemistry as the BM2 by default has some strange definitions of overall status.

If you select 'custom' then run the 'Configure' option afterwards to define voltage thresholds.

init.title: Options
init.description:
Sensor updates are only ever done when a Bluetooth advertisement is seen, so the rate limit is a way of throttling updates if the device is sending out a lot of advertisements.

It is recommended to select the appropriate battery chemistry as the BM2 by default has some strange definitions of overall status.

If you select 'custom' then run the 'Configure' option afterwards to define voltage thresholds.

custom_battery_details.title: Custom battery values
custom_battery_details.description: Provide the appropriate voltage thresholds for your battery so its state can be monitored correctly.  The overall percentage will be determined from the 0%, 20%, 50% and 100% figures provided, with interpolation as required.
